description: "In this personal memoir, Enrique Oltuski recounts the experiences of his revolutionary life: organizing the urban guerrilla movement in Havana and Santa Clara, launching the official underground newspaper, raising money for arms and medical supplies, initiating urban military operations - including retaliative bombings of army headquarters and assassinations of notorious police terrorists - and working with Che Guevara in the battles against the heinous dictator Fulgencio Batista and his overwhelmingly superior armed forces."--Jacket.
title: Vida Clandestina
